relate to rail travel. These cover a wide range, from heritage steam trains to high-speed bullet trains, from sightseeing or dinner trains to the convenience of speed as a means of modern transport.  For the traveller, available information about the range of services can vary greatly.

In many countries, rail travel is the basic means of transport.  Travellers who must travel by rail often encounter timetables and information being available in local languages only, poorly translated information or hard to understand ticketing requirements.
